title: december 16: spilling the (boston) tea
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about one of the events that foretold the beginning of the Revolutionary War: the Boston Tea Party, where colonists dumped chests of tea into the ocean. She also talks about the collision of a holiday song and the #MeToo movement. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
